title: LayerCollector
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: LayerCollector
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  The base class of 2D UI containers which render Class.GuiObject|GuiObjects
  in layers.
description: |
  LayerCollector is the base class of 2D UI containers which render
  Class.GuiObject descendants, such as Class.ScreenGui.

  For performance improvements, the appearance of a Class.LayerCollector is
  cached until one of the following events occurs:

  - A descendant is added to or removed from it.
  - A property of a descendant changes.
  - A property of the Class.LayerCollector itself changes.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - GuiBase2d
descendants:
  - BillboardGui
  - PluginGui
  - ScreenGui
  - SurfaceGuiBase
tags:
  - NotCreatable
  - NotBrowsable
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: LayerCollector.Enabled
    summary: |
      Toggles the visibility of this Class.LayerCollector.
    description: |
      Toggles the visibility of this Class.LayerCollector. When false, the
      UI contents will not render, process user input, or update in response to
      changes.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: LayerCollector.ResetOnSpawn
    summary: |
      Determines if the Class.LayerCollector resets (deletes itself and
      re-clones into the player's Class.PlayerGui) every time the player's
      character respawns.
    description: |
      When set to false and this Class.LayerCollector is a direct child of
      Class.StarterGui, it will only be cloned into each player's
      Class.PlayerGui once and it will not be deleted when the player's
      character respawns.

      When set to true (default), or if this Class.LayerCollector is an
      indirect descendant of Class.StarterGui, it will be cloned into each
      player's Class.PlayerGui when their character respawns, and it will
      delete itself when the player's character respawns again.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: LayerCollector.ZIndexBehavior
    summary: |
      Controls how Class.GuiObject.ZIndex behaves on all descendants of this
      Class.LayerCollector.
    description: |
      Controls how Class.GuiObject.ZIndex behaves on all descendants of this
      Class.LayerCollector.

      With Enum.ZIndexBehavior.Sibling (default), children always render above
      their parents, and the Class.GuiObject.ZIndex|ZIndex is used to decide
      the order in which children of a single UI object will render over each
      other.

      Enum.ZIndexBehavior.Global sorts all descendants according to the
      Class.GuiObject.ZIndex|ZIndex, then breaks ties using the hierarchy
      order. As a result, descendants of a Class.GuiObject need to have a
      Class.GuiObject.ZIndex|ZIndex value that's at least as high as the
      parent, or they will render underneath their parent.
    codesamples: []
    type: ZIndexBehavior
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI

        summary: ''
    tags:

    security: None
